title: Return Request Details
description: Following model is returned when operation succeeds

csrRepository.description: CSR Repository contains returns and exchanges of orders

returnRequestId.description: The ID of the return request.

isExchangeRequest.description: Either it is exchange / return request

dynamicProperties.description: Array of custom properties at order line item level.

id.description: The ID of the dynamic property.

label.description: The label of the dynamic property.

value.description: The value of the dynamic property.

billingProfileId.description: The billing profile ID associated to the current item.

billingAccountId.description: The billing account ID associated to the current item.

serviceAccountId.description: The service account ID associated to the current item.

deactivationDate.description: The deactivation date in ISO format.

displayName.description: Product display name of the sub sku commerce item

externalData.description: External data to be associated with a commerce item, provided by a configurator system.

values.description: The array of values associated with an externalData item.

dynamic_property_key.description: This property's name and value will be retrieved from a configurator system, so will be dynamically set.

name.description: The name to be associated with the externalData item.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the externalData item by the configurator system.

parentAssetKey.description: The parentAssetKey is only assigned when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

asset.description: The flag that determines if the current item is an asset or not.

configuratorId.description: Configurator Id of the returned item

assetKey.description: The assetKey is only assigned when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

unAdjustedRefundAmount.description: Refund Amount of the item excluding orderDiscountShare and ManualAdjustmentShare

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the item by the configurator system.

itemPromotionRefNo.description: Reference to the Item Level Promotion.

adjustedAmount.description: Amount adjusted as a result of applied promotion.

promotionAdjustmentType.description: Type of promotion Adjustment. Possible values are Adjusted / Removed.

customerAccountId.description: The customer account ID associated to the current item.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties of the return item

activationDate.description: The activation date in ISO format.

actualRefundAmount.description: Actual Refund Amount at Item level

deactivationDate.description: The deactivation date in ISO format.

nonreturnable.description: Indicates whether the item is returnable or not

values.description: The array of values associated with an externalData item.

dynamic_property_key.description: This property's name and value will be retrieved from a configurator system, so will be dynamically set.

name.description: The name to be associated with the externalData item.

actionCode.description: The action code that has been set on the externalData item by the configurator system.

commerceItemId.description: Commerce Id of the returned item

returnReasonId.description: Id Reason to return an Item

serviceId.description: The service ID associated to the current item.

serviceAccountId.description: The service account ID associated to the current item.

shippingGroupId.description: Shipping group Id of the returned item

rootAssetKey.description: The rootAssetKey is only assigned when the root item has been set as assetable in the catalog and has been configured.

transactionDate.description: ISO formatted Date on which the service action should be triggered.

propertyType.description: Type that indicates whether it is a base or a custom SKU property,

name.description: Name of the Dynamic SKU Property.

id.description: ID of the Dynamic SKU Property.

value.description: Value of the Dynamic SKU Property.

adjustedPromotionReferences.description: Reference to the Promotions linked to this returnItem

asset.description: The flag that determines if the current item is an asset or not.

primaryThumbImageURL.description: The url for the return item image

primaryImageAltText.description: The alt text for the return item image

submitExchangeAllowedValidationMessage.description: submitExchangeAllowedValidationMessage will come in json response if isSubmitExchangeOrderAllowed property is false

organization.description: The Organization associated with the B2B customer profile.

name.description: The name of of the organization.

isSubmitExchangeOrderAllowed.description: Indicates whether submit exchange order allowed or not.It will get populated only in exchange flow.

returnLabel.description: Return Label of the return request

authorizationNumber.description: RMA is the merchant authorization number required for validation

originOfOrder.description: The source from which order got created.

amount.description: The raw number that represents the price.

isTaxIncluded.description: Indicates if tax is included in item price

subTotal.description: The subtotal of the order before applying order-level promotions.

total.description: The current working total, including all promotions, tax, and billing costs.

shipping.description: The shipping cost of the order.

secondaryCurrencyShippingSurchargeValue.description: The secondary currency shipping surcharge amount.

currencyCode.description: Indicates the currency of the price. For example, USD indicates that the price is in US dollars.

recurringChargePriceInfo.description: Detailed information of the recurring charges at the shipping groups level

subTotalByFrequency.description: subtotal of the item by frequency

siteId.description: Site Id on which the Order was placed.

repositoryId.description: Repository ID of the list prices
Repository ID of the sale prices

shippingSurchargePriceList.description: Price List for shipping surcharge prices

repositoryId.description: Repository ID of the shipping surcharge prices

creationDate.description: Date on which the Order was created.

submittedDate.description: Date on which the Order was submitted.

refundInfo.description: Refund Information at the returnRequest Level.

secondaryCurrencySuggestedTaxRefund.description: Suggested tax Refund of all Return Items in secondary currency

totalRefund.description: Total sum of all the Refunds

suggestedTaxRefund.description: Tax Refund of all Return Items

actualShippingRefund.description: Actual Shipping Refund at Item level

actualTaxRefund.description: Actual Tax Refund at Item level

secondaryCurrencySuggestedShippingSurcha.description: Suggested shipping surcharge refund of all Return Items in secondary currency

secondaryCurrencyActualTaxRefund.description: Actual tax refund of all Return Items in secondary currency

suggestedShippingRefund.description: Shipping Refund of all Return Items

secondaryCurrencyActualShippingRefund.description: Actual shipping refund of all Return Items in secondary currency

suggestedOrderRefund.description: Refund Amount of all Return Items

refundDueMap.description: A hashmap with currency code as a key and the refund due amount as the value.Map will be returned in response if payment is done with multiple currencies

additionalProperties.description: refund due amount in respective currency

unAdjustedRefundSubtotal.description: Refund SubTotal calculated as summation of unAdjustedRefundAmount for all return Items.

secondaryCurrencySuggestedShippingRefund.description: Suggested shipping Refund of all Return Items in secondary currency

secondaryCurrencyActualShippingSurcharge.description: Actual shipping surcharge refund of all Return Items in secondary currency

promotionAdjustments.description: Total promotions at Return item and Order level

promotionAdjustmentsCount.description: Count of the total number of promotions applied

itemPromotionRefNo.description: Reference to the Item Level Promotion.

adjustedAmount.description: Amount adjusted as a result of applied promotion.

promotionAdjustmentType.description: Type of promotion Adjustment. Possible values are Adjusted / Removed.

totalOrderDiscountAdjustment.description: The total change in order level promotion value adjustments due to the return

nonReturnItemCostAdjustment.description: The cost adjustment for item which are not returned.

amountAdjustment.description: Amount adjusted as result of item returned.

shippingShareAdjustment.description: Adjustment made on the shipping group.

itemPromotionRefNo.description: Reference to the Item Level Promotion.

adjustedAmount.description: Amount adjusted as a result of applied promotion.

promotionAdjustmentType.description: Type of promotion Adjustment. Possible values are Adjusted / Removed.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties of the return request

state.description: Translated Value of returned request status.

quoteInfo.description: the quote information of the order

providerNote.description: the provider note for the quoted order
the provider note for the quoted order

profileType.description: the profile type of the user that requested the quote

profileId.description: the profile id of the user

rejectionDate.description: the rejection date an order whose quote has been rejected by user

requestDate.description: the date when the quote was requested in ISO format

quoteDate.description: the date the order was quoted in milliseconds

rejectionNote.description: the rejection note for an order whose quote has been rejected by user

rejectionDate.description: the rejection date for an order whose quote has been rejected by user

requestDate.description: the date when the quote was requested in ISO format

errorInfo.description: the array of errors, if any

externalId.description: the external id for the quote

rejectionNote.description: the rejection note for an order whose quote has been rejected by user

quoteDate.description: the date the order was quoted in milliseconds

expirationDate.description: the expiration date of the quoted order, if any

trackingNumber.description: List of tracking numbers for the return request

refundType.description: Type of the refund. For example this can be tokenized credit card

amount.description: The amount pertaining to the credit card

creditCardType.description: The type of the credit card

state.description: The state of the return request

maxRefundAmount.description: The maximum amount that can be refunded from the card

totalRefund.description: The total refund amount of the return request.

totalReturnQuantity.description: The total returned quantity in the return request.

returnItems.nonReturnableReaon: No items in order are returnable

notes.providerNote: The quote is approved as per the request

notes.requesterNote: provide 10 percent off on the total quantity
